url: Target site (e.g., https://techcrunch.com)

🧠 Filter Relevant Articles

Posts the summary to a specific Slack channel (e.g., #market-research)

Absolutely! Here's your **Market Research Automation Workflow** beautifully divided into logical sections, with clear explanations and fitting icons to help you grasp each part at a glance.

---

# 🚀 **n8n Market Research Automation Workflow**

Automate the process of **crawling news sites**, **filtering for relevant content**, **summarizing it with AI**, and **posting it to Slack** — all in a seamless flow.

---

## ⏰ 1. **Trigger & Scheduling**

**Node:** `🕒 Daily Market Research Trigger`

> Starts the workflow on a recurring schedule.

🔧 **What it does:**

* Runs every morning (or your defined time)
* Ensures your team receives fresh updates daily

📅 **Example Cron Setting:**

* Every day at 8:00 AM

---

## 🌐💻 2. **Crawling & Filtering**

### **Nodes:**

* `🌐 Crawl TechCrunch (FireCrawl)` *(HTTP Request)*
* `🧠 Filter Relevant Articles` *(Code)*

### 🔍 What these nodes do:

#### 🌐 **Crawl TechCrunch (FireCrawl)**

* Uses a **POST** request to FireCrawl’s API
* Inputs:

  * `url`: Target site (e.g., `https://techcrunch.com`)
  * `crawl_type`: `"scrape"`
  * `extract_article`: `true`
* Retrieves:

  * `title`, `content`, `author`, `published_at`

#### 🧠 **Filter Relevant Articles**

* Uses a `Code` node to check if the article is relevant
* Keywords like `"AI"`, `"machine learning"`, `"startup"` are matched
* Filters only the articles that **matter to your domain**

📄 **Sample Code:**

```javascript
const keywords = ['AI', 'machine learning', 'startup', 'generative'];
const results = [];

for (const item of items) {
  const title = item.json.article?.title?.toLowerCase() || '';
  const content = item.json.article?.content?.toLowerCase() || '';

  const isRelevant = keywords.some(keyword =>
    title.includes(keyword.toLowerCase()) ||
    content.includes(keyword.toLowerCase())
  );

  if (isRelevant) {
    results.push(item); // keep only relevant articles
  }
}

return results;
```

---

## 🤖💬 3. **Summarization & Delivery**

### **Nodes:**

* `🧠 Summarize Article with AI` *(AI Agent)*
* `🔗 OpenAI Chat (Summarizer)` *(OpenAI Chat Model)*
* `💬 Send Summary to Slack` *(Slack)*

### 📌 What happens here:

#### 🤖 **Summarize Article with AI**

* Passes the article to a GPT-4 or GPT-3.5 agent
* Uses a prompt like:

  > “Summarize the following article in 3 bullet points…”

#### 💡 **OpenAI Chat (Summarizer)**

* Executes the actual summarization
* Outputs a short, clean summary ideal for fast reading

#### 💬 **Send Summary to Slack**

* Posts the summary to a specific Slack channel (e.g., `#market-research`)
* Message format example:

  ```
  🔍 *Market Research Summary*
  *Title:* OpenAI launches GPT-5
  *Link:* https://techcrunch.com/article
  *Summary:*
  - GPT-5 improves reasoning
  - Enhanced safety mechanisms
  - Better multilingual performance
  ```

meta.description: The latest technology news and information on startups.

article.title: OpenAI launches GPT-5
article.author: Jane Doe
article.content: OpenAI has officially released GPT-5, a major upgrade with enhanced reasoning and safety improvements...
